topic.title: Learning how the database system works
topic.body:
I'm probably sounding like a total noob, but after reading the Docs multiple times I still can't seem to grasp how it works. Does anyone have a bare basic example.

Such as something that shows how to have database entries that only a certain user can write on (such as for a profile), having database entries that anyone can write in, and preventing loads of spam entries into the database (if that's possible with the API).

26_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf.body: Maybe it would be possible to use the API to create an anti-spam bot for your site, although the bot would have to be centralized.
